testcase.name: Budget treats None limits as unbounded
testcase.system-out:
@scenario.begin Scenario: Budget treats None limits as unbounded When I apply a budget with no per-source or character limits ... passed in 0.000s Then the budget returns 2 evidence items ... passed in 0.000s And the budget returns evidence ranks "1,2" ... passed in 0.000s
